name: Zeus Stole My Wife, & Now I Am Angry
name_original: Zeus Stole My Wife, & Now I Am Angry
description:
This was made in two weeks as a part of a game jam hosted by our university, the theme was "Road Trip" and our destination was Athens.

The game is a 2D side scroller that combines dumb comedy quiz screens with juiced shooter gameplay. We decided as a group that we simply had to include the Greek gods in the game, and to also include as much text to speech as possible. We hope you enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it.

There is also an .exe version to download if you wish to play it that way.

Credits:

Dylan Chambore - Design, quotes Toby Maguire spiderman too much
Amelia Lazouras - Character art, has the coolest name on the team
Janina Abelmann - Environment art, called Joe "Callum" one time
George Irtelli - Lead programmer, winner of meme queen 2021
George Socol - Programming, is in fact "so cool"
Lukus Richards - Programming, doesn't have a favourite pokemon
Ovidiu Bogdan - Audio & Particles, had his mic turned off
Alex Campos John - audio, eventually turned his mic on
Syed Labib - Soundtrack, wrote tasty jams
Tommy Brown - Art, joined the team at half time, still played his part
